content: on this round 24 single_crochet 8 chain-5 space 4 chain-1 space 4 chain-2 space ó handmadebykama r6 in the same space as join*double_crochet in chain-1 space chain 3 skip single_crochet 3 double_crochet in chain-5 space double_crochet in next 2 single_crochet 2 double_crochet chain 2 2 double_crochet in chain-2 space double_crochet in next 2 single_crochet 3 double_crochet in chain-5 space chain 3 skip single_crochet * repeat from*to* 4 times note the first double_crochet on this round is made in the same space as the join 60 double_crochet 8 chain-3 space 4 chain-2 space r7 in the same space as join *double_crochet in double_crochet 2 double_crochet in chain-3 space double_crochet in next 7 double_crochet 2 double_crochet chain 2 2 double_crochet in chain-2 space double_crochet in next 7 double_crochet 2 double_crochet in chain-3 space* repeat from*to* 4 times 92 double_crochet 4 chain-2 space fasten_off weave in all ends and block your square hope you have enjoyed making it i would love to see your finished work please tag me at @handmadebykama on instagram and use #flowerpopsquare please do not hesitate to contact me with any questions regarding this pattern please note that this pattern is for personal use only cannot be sold or reproduced you may sell items made using this pattern but please credit me as the designer ó handmadebykama
